short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turns the Chrome new tab into an AI-powered chat interface.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AI New Tab is the easiest way to interact with AI every day. The AI New Tab Chrome extension integrates OpenAI's advanced language models, ChatGPT and GPT-4, directly into your browsing experience with every new tab you open. 

With its cutting-edge AI capabilities, this extension is designed to make your browser more fun, more productive, more engaging, and more informative!

Customization - with any prompt!
AI New Tab makes it easy for ANYONE to create a 100% CUSTOM new tab experience. By selecting one of the available custom prompts, users can personalize the information and content they receive from ChatGPT Assistant. 

Below are some examples of custom prompts that users can choose from:

Default (Inspirational Quote):
This prompt allows AI New Tab to greet users with an inspirational quote as they open a new browser tab. The quote is accompanied by a practical suggestion on how users can apply the wisdom of the quote to their daily lives.

Cat Facts:
For cat lovers, this prompt provides a fun and engaging experience by sharing an interesting cat fact along with a light-hearted cat joke, making users smile as they open new browser tabs.

Bible:
With this prompt, AI New Tab randomly selects a meaningful Bible verse and explains its significance. The extension also offers guidance on how to incorporate the teachings of the verse into everyday life, making it an ideal choice for users looking for spiritual enrichment.

Trivia:
Transform your new tab into a fun quiz session with the Trivia prompt. AI New Tab will ask trivia questions of increasing difficulty and track user scores. Users can challenge themselves with new questions as they navigate the web.

Best of Reddit:
Stay informed and entertained with the Best of Reddit prompt. AI New Tab shares interesting posts from subreddits like LifeProTips or TodayILearned, and provides a link for users to read more and dive deeper into the topics that interest them.

Custom (Subscription required):
For users who want a truly personalized experience, subscribing to the premium version of AI New Tab allows you to create their own custom prompts. Simply type any prompt you'd like, and AI New Tab will open every browser tab to exactly what you want.


More AI features

Instant information
Ask AI New Tab to look up information, definitions, or explanations right in your new tab. No need to open a new tab or search engine - get the information you need right where you are.

Summarization
Reading lengthy articles or documents? Let AI New Tab help you save time by summarizing the content into concise, easy-to-understand points. Just ask it to summarize anything you want!

Translation
AI New Tab makes language barriers a thing of the past. Translate entire webpages or selected text snippets into your preferred language with just a few clicks.

Writing advice
Need help crafting the perfect email, social media post, or blog entry? AI New Tab can provide suggestions, corrections, and improvements to your text, ensuring your writing is clear, concise, and error-free.


Upgrade your browsing experience today with AI New Tab! Use AI to make yourself more efficient and more productive. Whether you're a student, professional, or casual browser, AI New Tab is the ultimate tool to help you navigate the web like never before.
